subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Lars Eller scored the lone shootout goal, and Carey Price stopped all three of the shots he faced in the tiebreaker as the visiting Montreal Canadiens beat the Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1.
snippet: Lars Eller scored the lone shootout goal, and Carey Price stopped all three of the shots he faced in the tiebreaker as the visiting Montreal Canadiens beat the Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1.
